content.text: Match ends, SV Werder Bremen 2, Ajax 3.
Second Half ends, SV Werder Bremen 2, Ajax 3.
Goal!  SV Werder Bremen 2, Ajax 3. Nils Petersen (SV Werder Bremen) right footed shot from the right side of the box to the bottom left corner. Assisted by Eljero Elia with a through ball.
Goal!  SV Werder Bremen 1, Ajax 3. Christian Eriksen (Ajax) right footed shot from outside the box to the centre of the goal. Assisted by Siem de Jong.
Attempt blocked. Levent Aycicek (SV Werder Bremen) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked.
Aleksandar Ignjovski (SV Werder Bremen) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Dico Koppers (Ajax).
Goal!  SV Werder Bremen 1, Ajax 2. Joseph Akpala (SV Werder Bremen) right footed shot from the centre of the box to the bottom right corner.
Attempt saved. Niclas Füllkrug (SV Werder Bremen) right footed shot from the left side of the box is saved in the bottom right corner. Assisted by Eljero Elia.
Attempt blocked. Florian Hartherz (SV Werder Bremen) left footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Nils Petersen with a cross.
Substitution, SV Werder Bremen. Niclas Füllkrug replaces Predrag Stevanovic.
